Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Jarvis. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier signal problems at Jarvis.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
